mapper.select: /* todo-manager.findListTodoUserSupplier : 할일 항목 별 사용자 목록 조회 */ SELECT TUSR.TODOITEM_UUID , TUSR.USR_ID , USR.USR_NM , VDGL.VD_CD , VDGL.ERP_VD_CD , VDGL.VD_NM FROM TODOITEM_USR TUSR INNER JOIN USR USR ON USR.TEN_ID = TUSR.TEN_ID AND USR.USR_ID = TUSR.USR_ID INNER JOIN VD VDGL ON VDGL.TEN_ID = USR.TEN_ID AND VDGL.VD_CD = USR.VD_CD WHERE TUSR.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND TUSR.TODOITEM_UUID = #{p.todoitem_uuid}
